sentences.sContent: His main concern is to be able to provide for his family.
sentences.sCn: 他最为关心的事就是能够养家。

sentences.sContent: The report concerns the drug traffic on the Mexican-US border.
sentences.sCn: 这篇报告讲的是墨西哥和美国边境的毒品交易。

sentences.sContent: ...The mayor concern about the sharing economy is how the government regulates it...
...but the actual reduction in postgraduate numbers is of real concern as international-students make up the majority of numbers in many postgraduate courses and research teams in science...
...Now with three places my main concern is keeping the business successful and running smoothly...
...Such values are more likely to motivate workers than financial targets which ultimately only concern a few people...
...What is the woman's greatest concern about the man's plan...

phrases.pCn: ◎从事,忙于(常与with, about, in, over连用)
对…表示担心/忧虑；使（自己）关心…
adj. 干预；从事（参与；从事参与）；干涉

remMethod.val: con(表加强) ＋ cern(搞清) → 一定要搞清楚 → 关心

words.tran: 担心地；关心公众事务地
关心（concern的过去时和过去分词）；与…有关

trans.tranOther: something that is important to you or that involves you
if a story, book, report etc concerns someone or something, it is about them
